tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: The annual IFRS Taxonomy 2017
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description: The IFRS Taxonomy 2017 reflects the presentation and disclosure requirements of the IFRS Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board ('Board') at 1 January 2017, the IFRS for SMEs as issued by the Board in December 2015 and the IFRS Practice Statement Management Commentary as issued by the Board in December 2010. The IFRS Taxonomy also includes elements to reflect IFRS reporting practice (‘common practice’). The main amendments made to the IFRS Taxonomy 2016 that are included in the IFRS Taxonomy 2017 include: Disclosure Initiative (Amendments to IAS 7) issued by the Board in January 2016, Applying IFRS 9 Financial Instruments with IFRS 4 Insurance Contracts (Amendments to IFRS 4) issued by the Board in September 2016 and new common practice for agriculture, leisure, franchises, retail and financial institutions.

tp:license.name: The IFRS Taxonomy - Terms and Conditions

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Basic Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting. Documentation labels are included, but generic links are excluded.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Basic Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting. Documentation labels and generic links are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS, IFRS for SMEs and Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Combined Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS, IFRS for SMEs and Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Deprecated Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the deprecated taxonomy elements for IFRS reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Deprecated Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the deprecated taxonomy elements for IFRS reporting. Documentation labels are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting. Documentation labels are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS and Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting with Management Commentary. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Full IFRS and Management Commentary Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for full IFRS reporting with Management Commentary. Documentation labels are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS for SMEs Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for IFRS for SMEs reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: IFRS for SMEs Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for IFRS for SMEs reporting. Documentation labels are not included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Management Commentary Entry Point including documentation labels.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are included.

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: Management Commentary Entry Point.
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This is the Entry Point for viewing the taxonomy for Management Commentary reporting. Documentation labels are not included.
